name: Differences - Try to Find them
description:
Find the differences between two pictures!
Play daily, train your attention and learn to concentrate.

— Find the differences between two almost identical pictures
— As soon as you see it, tap it
— If do not find any, zoom the picture to see all the details
— Can not find a difference, try to use a hint
— Try to meet the deadline
— The application has a great amount of amazing high quality pictures of many themes and styles

How attentive and fast are you? Take the challenge now!

More about Differences:
